items.label: Blur
items.tooltip: Amount of blur to apply to elements.

items.label: Border Thickness
items.tooltip: Thickness of borders for elements.

items.label: Border Radius
items.tooltip: Rounded corners for card elements.

items.label: Button Border Radius
items.tooltip: Rounded corners for buttons.

items.label: Blur
items.tooltip: Amount of blur to apply to the Default Background.

items.label: Brightness
items.tooltip: Brightness level of the Default Background.

items.label: Contrast
items.tooltip: Contrast level of the Default Background.

items.label: Saturation
items.tooltip: Saturation level of the Default Background.

items.label: Blur
items.tooltip: Amount of blur to apply to the animated background.

items.label: Saturation
items.tooltip: Saturation level of the animated background.

items.label: Contrast
items.tooltip: Contrast level of the animated background.

items.label: Brightness
items.tooltip: Brightness level of the animated background.

items.label: Animation Time
items.tooltip: Time it takes for the animated background to complete one cycle. (30s-60s prefered, 0 = no animation)

items.label: Opacity
items.tooltip: Opacity of the whole backdrop.

items.label: Background Color Opacity
items.tooltip: Background Color Opacity of the now playing bar.

items.label: Height
items.tooltip: Height of the now playing bar.

items.label: Padding
items.tooltip: Space between the content and the edges of the now playing bar.

items.label: Border Radius
items.tooltip: Rounded corners for the now playing bar.

items.label: Blur
items.tooltip: Amount of blur to apply to the now playing bar.

items.label: Saturation
items.tooltip: Saturation level of the now playing bar.

items.label: Contrast
items.tooltip: Contrast level of the now playing bar.

items.label: Brightness
items.tooltip: Brightness level of the now playing bar.

items.label: Opacity
items.tooltip: Opacity of the background for beautiful lyrics.
